verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> their <S%H4264>armies<s%> together for <S%H6635>warfare,<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> And <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H3045>Know<s%> you <S%H3045>assuredly,<s%> that you shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out with me to <S%H4264>battle,<s%> you and your <S%H582>men.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H397>Achish,<s%> <S%H3651>Surely<s%> you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> can <S%H6213>do.<s%> And <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> Therefore will I <S%H7760>make<s%> you <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of my <S%H7218>head<s%> for <S%H3605>ever.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>

Now <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H5594>lamented<s%> him, and <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> even in his own <S%H5892>city.<s%> And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had <S%H5493>put<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H1992>those<s%> that had familiar <S%H178>spirits,<s%> and the <S%H3049>wizards,<s%> out of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> themselves together, and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H7766>Shunem:<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> together, and they <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H1533>Gilboa.<s%>
And when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> he was <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> and his <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H2729>trembled.<s%>

And when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him not, <S%H1571>neither<s%> by <S%H2472>dreams,<s%> <S%H1571>nor<s%> by <S%H224>Urim,<s%> <S%H1571>nor<s%> by <S%H5030>prophets.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H1245>Seek<s%> me a <S%H802>woman<s%> that <S%H1172>has<s%> a familiar <S%H178>spirit,<s%> that I may <S%H3212>go<s%> to her, and <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of her. And his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> there is a <S%H802>woman<s%> that <S%H1172>has<s%> a familiar <S%H178>spirit<s%> at <S%H5874>Endor.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H2664>disguised<s%> himself, and <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H899>raiment,<s%> and he <S%H3212>went,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> with him, and they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H802>woman<s%> by <S%H3915>night:<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H7080>divine<s%> to me by the familiar <S%H178>spirit,<s%> and <S%H5927>bring<s%> me him up, <S%H853>whom<s%> <S%H834><s%> I shall <S%H559>name<s%> to you.

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> has <S%H6213>done,<s%> how he has <S%H3772>cut<s%> off those that have familiar <S%H178>spirits,<s%> and the <S%H3049>wizards,<s%> out of the <S%H776>land:<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> then lay you a <S%H5367>snare<s%> for my <S%H5315>life,<s%> to cause me to <S%H4191>die?<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to her by the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> there shall <S%H518>no<s%> <S%H5771>punishment<s%> <S%H7136>happen<s%> to you for <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing.<s%>
Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H853>Whom<s%> <S%H4310><s%> shall I <S%H5927>bring<s%> up to you? And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5927>Bring<s%> me up <S%H8050>Samuel.<s%>

And when the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> she <S%H2199>cried<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice:<s%> and the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> have you <S%H7411>deceived<s%> me? for you are <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, Be not <S%H3372>afraid:<s%> for <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> you? And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H5927>ascending<s%> out of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H8389>form<s%> is he of? And she <S%H559>said,<s%> An <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5927>comes<s%> up; and he is <S%H5844>covered<s%> with a <S%H4598>mantle.<s%> And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3045>perceived<s%> that it was <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> and he <S%H6915>stooped<s%> with his <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself.

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> have you <S%H7264>disquieted<s%> me, to <S%H5927>bring<s%> me up? And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> I am <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H6887>distressed;<s%> for the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> make <S%H3898>war<s%> against me, and <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5493>departed<s%> from me, and <S%H6030>answers<s%> me <S%H3808>no<s%> more, <S%H1571>neither<s%> by <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H1571>nor<s%> by <S%H2472>dreams:<s%> therefore I have <S%H7121>called<s%> you, that you may make <S%H3045>known<s%> to me <S%H4100>what<s%> I shall <S%H6213>do.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> then do you <S%H7592>ask<s%> of me, seeing the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H5493>departed<s%> from you, and is <S%H1961>become<s%> your <S%H6145>enemy?<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> to him, as he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> by me: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H7167>rent<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> out of your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5414>given<s%> it to your <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> even to <S%H1732>David:<s%>

<S%H834>Because<s%> you <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> not the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6213>executed<s%> his <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>wrath<s%> on <S%H6002>Amalek,<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> has the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> to you <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H1571>Moreover<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with you into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines:<s%> and to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> shall you and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> be with me: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H4116>straightway<s%> <S%H4393>all<s%> <S%H4393>along<s%> <S%H6967><s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and was <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> because of the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H8050>Samuel:<s%> and there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> in him; for he had <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day,<s%> nor <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3915>night.<s%>

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he was <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H926>troubled,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> your <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> has <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> your <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and I have <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%> in my <S%H3709>hand,<s%> and have <S%H8085>listened<s%> to your <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to me.

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H8085>listen<s%> you <S%H1571>also<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H8198>handmaid,<s%> and let me <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H6595>morsel<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you; and <S%H398>eat,<s%> that you may have <S%H3581>strength,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H3212>go<s%> on your <S%H1870>way.<s%>

But he <S%H3985>refused,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> I will not <S%H398>eat.<s%> But his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> together with the <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H6555>compelled<s%> him; and he <S%H8085>listened<s%> to their <S%H6963>voice.<s%> So he <S%H6965>arose<s%> from the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> on the <S%H4296>bed.<s%>

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> had a <S%H4770>fat<s%> <S%H5695>calf<s%> in the <S%H1004>house;<s%> and she <S%H4116>hurried,<s%> and <S%H2076>killed<s%> it, and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H7058>flour,<s%> and <S%H3888>kneaded<s%> it, and did <S%H644>bake<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread thereof:

And she <S%H5066>brought<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H5650>servants;<s%> and they did <S%H398>eat.<s%> Then they <S%H6965>rose<s%> up, and <S%H3212>went<s%> away that <S%H3915>night.<s%>
